name: Quick screenshot sharing
description:
Make a screenshot, upload it and share the link from your clipboard.
The packages 'xdg-user-dirs', 'gnome-screenshot', 'curl', 'jq' and 'xclip' must be installed.
The screenshots will also be saved in ~/Pictures/Screenshots/year-month.
Your upload history is saved in ~/.quick-screenshot-sharing.history
author: Odyssey
